sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, ImgWrap, Img, } from "./InfoElements"; const InfoSection = ({ id, topLine, headLine, description, imgStart, img, alt, lightBg, lightText, darkText, }) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headLine} {description} ); }; export default InfoSection;
